location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of his letter dated 23 May, reporting that the French Emissary Vincent Maurice had arrived from Muscat on board the Prince of Walescruiser, and informing that the Governor had disapproved of offering accommodation to him, and suggested the commander of the Prince of Walesbe more circumspect in future.
